title: Computer Power On
query: How to turn on the computer
ai_draft: To turn on the computer, first locate the power button. This button is typically found on the front of the computer tower or the laptop's keyboard area, and it often has a universal power symbol (a circle with a vertical line). Once you've found it, simply press the button. The computer should then begin its startup process.

How do I reset my SSO password?

To reset your SSO password, please navigate to https://sso.acme-corp.com/reset and follow the multi-factor authentication (MFA) prompts. Remember that your new password must be at least 12 characters long and include a symbol.
How do I reset my SSO password?

To reset your SSO password, please navigate to https://sso.acme-corp.com/reset and follow the multi-factor authentication (MFA) prompts. Remember that your new password must be at least 12 characters long and include a symbol.
How to turn on the computer

To turn on your computer, locate the power button. This is usually on the front or side of your computer tower (for desktops) or on the keyboard area (for laptops). Press and hold it for a few seconds until the computer starts to boot up. If it does not turn on, please ensure the power cable is securely plugged into both the computer and a working power outlet.

final_answer: To turn on the computer, first locate the power button. This button is typically found on the front of the computer tower or the laptop's keyboard area, and it often has a universal power symbol (a circle with a vertical line). Once you've found it, simply press the button. The computer should then begin its startup process.

history.message: Hi! I'm your IT Assistant. How can I help you today?
HI
Hello! I am your IT Assistant. How can I assist you with your IT needs today?
How can I get my google API key

Access to Google API keys is managed by the Development Operations (DevOps) team for security purposes. I will escalate this request immediately to them, and they will contact you with the necessary steps or to issue the key. Expect a response shortly.

final_answer: To get your Google Gemini API key, go to Google AI Studio and sign in with your Google account. Click "Get API key" in the left sidebar, then select "Create API key" to generate a key in a new or existing Google Cloud project. Copy and securely store this key for your applications.

title: Laptop Battery Drains Quickly
query: My laptop battery drains really fast, like in 2 hours.
ai_draft: I understand your laptop battery is draining very quickly. To help maximize battery life immediately, please try reducing your screen brightness and closing resource-intensive background applications like web browsers or communication tools (e.g., Slack). Additionally, please check your laptop's battery health status. If the reported health is below 80%, please reply to this ticket, and I will initiate a replacement process for the battery.

history.message: My laptop battery drains really fast, like in 2 hours.

final_answer: I understand your laptop battery is draining very quickly. To help maximize battery life immediately, please try reducing your screen brightness and closing resource-intensive background applications like web browsers or communication tools (e.g., Slack). Additionally, please check your laptop's battery health status. If the reported health is below 80%, please reply to this ticket, and I will initiate a replacement process for the battery.

title: Monitor Flickering Causing Headache
query: My monitor is flickering and gives me a headache.
ai_draft: I understand that your monitor is flickering and causing you discomfort. To resolve this quickly, please try the following troubleshooting steps: 1. Ensure the video cable (HDMI/DisplayPort) is securely plugged into both the monitor and the computer. Try swapping the cable if you have a spare. 2. Check your display settings and verify that the refresh rate is set to 60 Hz (or the recommended native rate for your monitor). 3. If the issue persists, please ensure your graphics drivers are fully updated. If none of these steps work, please reply with your monitor model and connection type (e.g., HDMI), and I will arrange a replacement or advanced diagnosis.

history.message: My monitor is flickering and gives me a headache.
